Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.match_items

Class Marketplace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.match_items.Marketplace
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus
public class Marketplace extends Object implements HasStatus
The marketplace is where the player can buy resources. It is made by 12 marbles placed in a grid of three rows and four columns. There is another marble placed on the slide.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Marketplace()
    Creates a Marketplace, places 12 random marbles in the grid and places the remaining marble in the slide.
    Marketplace​(int[] status)
    Creates a marketplace given an array of number that represents the marble colors (0: blue, 1: grey, 2: red, 3: violet, 4: white, 5: yellow).
    Marketplace​(ArrayList<MarbleColor> mc)
    Creates a marketplace given a list of 12 marble colors.

  • Constructor Details

    • Marketplace

      public Marketplace​(ArrayList<MarbleColor> mc)
      Creates a marketplace given a list of 12 marble colors. The marble placed on the slide is fixed and it's red.
      Parameters:
      mc - is a list made by 12 marble colors

    • Marketplace

      public Marketplace​(int[] status)
      Creates a marketplace given an array of number that represents the marble colors (0: blue, 1: grey, 2: red, 3: violet, 4: white, 5: yellow).
      Parameters:
      status - an array of integer

    • Marketplace

      public Marketplace()
      Creates a Marketplace, places 12 random marbles in the grid and places the remaining marble in the slide.

  • Method Details

    • getPos

      private int getPos​(int r, int c)
      Returns the index of the array list given row and column
      Parameters:
      r - index of the row of the Marketplace
      c - index of the column of the marketplace
      Returns:
      the position in the ArrayList

    • obtain

      public MarbleContainer obtain​(MarketDirection dir, int index)
      Allows to obtain marbles from the marketplace.
      Parameters:
      dir - vertical or horizontal
      index - column or row number [pre: index must be between 0 and 2 if dir is vertical and must be between 0 and 3 if dir is horizontal]
      Returns:
      the marbles in the chosen line

    • shiftMarketplace

      private void shiftMarketplace​(MarketDirection dir, int index)
      Shifts marbles the given line
      Parameters:
      dir - enum
      index - index of the row/column

    • getSlide

      private MarbleColor getSlide()
      Gets the marble in the slide
      Returns:
      the color of the Marble on the slide

    • getStatus

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStatus()
      In the status, 0: blue, 1: grey, 2: red, 3: violet, 4: white, 5: yellow
      Specified by:
      getStatus in interface HasStatus
      Returns:
      an ArrayList made of 13 Integer

    • notifyViews

      public void notifyViews()
      Notify the status of the Marketplace to the ModelObserver so the players can have this item updated in real time

    • attach

      public void attach​(ModelObserver mo)
      Adds to the list of observers the ModelObserver given
      Parameters:
      mo - ModelObserver that will receive the status of the Marketplace
